item.title: Hedge Funds Draw Pension Money to Riskiest Corner of a $1.3 Trillion Credit Market
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- A high-stakes trade in the riskiest corner of a $1.3 trillion credit market is enticing some of the world’s most conservative investors, raising concerns that in their aggressive hunt for higher yields they may be discounting some pitfalls. Pension plans and insurers have been piling ...
